name: Cute Fight
description:
Summary

This game is a top-down third-person shooter

Specific gameplay: Players control the machine to move left and right and shoot the targets on the field, and eliminate all the targets to pass the level.
During the period, there will be various enemy monsters in the field to hinder the player. Players need to avoid them to avoid damage. Of course, they are invincible, but if the player continues to attack them, some wonderful things will happen (?)

System


Move left and right to avoid obstacles and shoot targets, avoid being shot down by enemies before clearing all targets!

Clearing the level will unlock the beautiful CG in the gallery!
